description: Rule-in/rule-out decision criteria for Percent supracondylar fractures treated with open procedure

rule_in_criteria.description: All documentation complete, no complications, no adverse outcomes
Minor documentation gaps but no adverse outcomes

rule_out_criteria.description: Delayed presentation or transfer leading to stiff, swollen elbows
Inadequate closed reduction attempts or technique
Lack of pre-op imaging/assessment for vascular status
Use of open reduction without clear documentation of indication

ambiguity_triggers.description: Review question: Is the indication for open reduction clearly documented?
ambiguity_triggers.reviewer_prompt: Is the indication for open reduction clearly documented?

ambiguity_triggers.description: Review question: Were one or more closed reduction attempts performed and documented when appropriate?
ambiguity_triggers.reviewer_prompt: Were one or more closed reduction attempts performed and documented when appropriate?

ambiguity_triggers.description: Review question: Was vascular or soft tissue compromise described as a driver for open approach?

ambiguity_triggers.description: Review question: Were complications of open procedures (infection, stiffness) monitored and documented?
